courses.name: Painting Workshop
courses.description: Let your creativity run wild and learn the basics of painting.
courses.details: In this 2‑hour workshop you’ll explore color theory, brush techniques, and composition. All materials provided. Suitable for beginners and intermediate artists.

feedback.hint: Rate the course from 1 to 5 stars.

courses.name: Adventure Hike
courses.description: Explore nature and learn about flora and fauna on an exciting hike.
courses.details: Guided hike through Forest Park—learn about local wildlife, plants, and conservation. Bring water & sturdy shoes!

feedback.hint: Rate the hike from 1 to 5 stars.

courses.name: Swimming Course
courses.description: Learn to swim or improve your swimming techniques.
courses.details: Professional instructors will teach you stroke mechanics, breathing techniques, and water safety. Sessions grouped by skill level.

feedback.hint: Rate the swimming course from 1 to 5 stars.

courses.name: Pottery Workshop
courses.description: Create your own pottery pieces with clay and discover the world of ceramics.
courses.details: Hands‑on session where you’ll learn wheel‑throwing basics and hand‑building techniques. Finished pieces ready after firing in one week.

feedback.hint: Rate the pottery workshop from 1 to 5 stars.

courses.name: Science Experiments
courses.description: Explore exciting scientific experiments and discover the world of chemistry and physics.
courses.details: Conduct volcano eruptions, create slime, and explore magnetism in a safe lab environment. Perfect for curious minds aged 10 and up.

feedback.hint: Rate the science experiments from 1 to 5 stars.

courses.name: Kids Cooking Class
courses.description: Learn how to cook simple and delicious dishes and understand important ingredients in the kitchen.
courses.details: Kids will prepare pizzas, fruit salads, and simple desserts while learning about nutrition and kitchen safety.

feedback.hint: Rate the cooking class from 1 to 5 stars.

courses.name: Reading Club
courses.description: Read exciting stories together and learn how to choose good books.
courses.details: Weekly discussion of a selected children’s book, followed by creative drawing and role‑playing exercises inspired by the story.

feedback.hint: Rate the reading club from 1 to 5 stars.

courses.name: Knight Games
courses.description: Dive into the world of knights and princesses and experience exciting adventures.
courses.details: Medieval‑themed obstacle courses, sword‑play demos, and storytelling under the castle arches. Costumes encouraged!

feedback.hint: Rate the knight games from 1 to 5 stars.

courses.name: Music Class
courses.description: Learn an instrument or improve your musical knowledge in a group.
courses.details: Choose between guitar, piano, and percussion. Break into small ensembles to practice ensemble playing.

feedback.hint: Rate the music class from 1 to 5 stars.

courses.name: Kids Yoga
courses.description: Learn yoga techniques for relaxation and improving posture.
courses.details: Fun yoga sequences, breathing exercises, and mindfulness games designed for children aged 6–12.

feedback.hint: Rate the yoga class from 1 to 5 stars.

courses.name: Photography Basics
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of photography: composition, lighting, and camera settings.
courses.details: Hands‑on session using DSLR cameras. We'll cover aperture, shutter speed, ISO, and basic editing techniques.

feedback.hint: Rate the photography class from 1 to 5 stars.

courses.name: Beginner Robotics
courses.description: Build and program simple robots using Lego Mindstorms.
courses.details: Team‑based workshop where participants assemble robots and learn basic programming logic to complete challenges.

feedback.hint: Rate the robotics workshop from 1 to 5 stars.
